title: Alaska GOP Congressman Don Young, Dean of the House, Dies at Age 88
sub_head: Serving in his 25th term, he was knownÂ for driving money to his state and led the push to pass the Trans-Alaska Pipeline
body:
Rep. Don Young, the dean of the House of Representatives and the longest-serving Republican in history, has died. He was 88.
Mr. Young died while traveling home to Alaska, his office confirmed. His wife Anne was by his side.
